A4.text: the singles 'Only Love Can Break Your Heart' and 'When You Dance I Can Really Love'; and the title track, 'After the Gold Rush', played on piano, with dreamlike lyrics that ran a gamut of subjects from drugs and interpersonal relationships to environmental concerns
